results.title: Protected
results.brief_description: Dramatised documentary by Alessandro Cavadini looking at the oppression of Aborigines by the administrators of the reserve on Palm Island, Queensland, through the Aborigines’ own improvised re-enactment of their abortive 1957 strike against conditions.
results.description: Dramatised documentary by Alessandro Cavadini looking at the oppression of Aborigines by the administrators of the reserve on Palm Island, Queensland, through the Aborigines’ own improvised re-enactment of their abortive 1957 strike against conditions.

results.title: Protect your birds (Episode 5)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Wild Life”.
Explains the importance of birds to the farmer and shows each bird in close-up in its natural habitat. From the “Wild Life” series, No 5.

results.title: Protect your back
results.creator_credit: Jane Nicholls and Yoralla Society of Victoria
results.brief_description: Demonstrates safe lifting practices for families, friends and service providers of people with disabilities in community based environments. Overviews how the back works, risk factors and correct lifting practices. Provides guidelines for when the person being asisted can help or cannot communicate and assistance techniques including seating adjustment, discussing the lift, adjusting position in bed, transferring, assisted walking and lifting in a team.

results.title: Prostitute I am, common I'm not
results.brief_description: A revealing and honest film about five women who are prostitutes. They talk openly and intimately about themselves and their lives, telling why they do it, how they feel and how much they earn.
results.description: A revealing and honest film about five women who are prostitutes. They talk openly and intimately about themselves and their lives, telling why they do it, how they feel and how much they earn.

results.title: Prosthetic Head
results.brief_description: Prosthetic Head, is a computer-generated head that has real-time lip synching, speech synthesis, and facial expressions. Through a vision or sensor system, the Prosthetic Head will be able to acknowledge the presence and position of any physical body that approaches it and speak to the person who interrogates it.

results.title: Prostate disease
results.creator_credit: Diane Sundin, Peter Campbell, Merck, Sharp and Dohme and Special Broadcasting Services
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “English at work”.
This program looks at the early symptoms of prostate problems, how many men react to these and what men need to do to prevent prostate cancer. An excellent progam to encourage men to have check ups at an early stage of problems. Partly dramatised.

results.title: Prospectus for growth
results.brief_description: Demonstrates how the investment of foreign capital contributes to the economic development of traditionally agricultural countries by promoting the growth and diversification of industry. It shows how capital investment from the United States has made possible improvemnets in the standard of living in Latin America, the Near East and Far East.

results.title: Prospecting for petroleum
results.creator_credit: Duke Goldstone, George Pal and Shell Film Unit
results.brief_description: An account of man’s never-ending search for oil. Opens with a dramatized survey of the importance of oil in modern industrial economy, followed by an account of how oil is formed in the earth’s crust. Methods used by early oil prospectors are compared with the magnetic gravimetric and seismic surveys used in the modern search for oil. An animated film.
